question: Mikhail Mishustin, who has approved to begin major governance reform, is the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
The Prime Minister of Russia Mikhail Mishustin has recently approved to begin a major governance reform in the country. The reforms are to begin from January 1, 2021.
These reforms were to be implemented earlier, but were postponed due to many factors including COVID 19. The proposed reforms are aimed to improve the efficiency of Government functioning.
